thread.title: Vega ECM Solutions announces corporate name change to Intellective

author: cnbc.com
title: Vega ECM Solutions announces corporate name change to Intellective
text:
IRVINE, Calif., Feb. 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Vega ECM Solutions is changing its name to Intellective, launching a new company website and introducing an updated corporate identity. We are making these changes to highlight the increasing importance of cognitive computing and analytics in our offerings.
Effective Tuesday, February 13th, 2018 the new name of Vega ECM Solutions will be Intellective, reflecting the company's continued growth and focus on providing products and solutions that incorporate intelligence as part of the business process. In conjunction with the name change, Intellective will launch a new website and associated marketing collateral, notify customers and partners of the planned change and expand our presence socially.
Intellective is a recognized leader in digital transformation, helping customers improve their business operations and modernize enterprise applications. The company increases efficiency and effectiveness within business operations while enabling IT to better manage infrastructure costs. Intellective creates market driven products and services which dramatically speed solutions into production while adding valuable cognitive intelligence and analytic functionality to executives, managers and front-line workers. Intellective products deploy rapidly and with dramatic impact to the operation and have a high ROI. Our new name better aligns what we do with who we are.
https://youtu.be/_mkKqkfO7OQ
Intellective will continue to focus on providing a full service consultancy as well as enhance it's flagship products Unity and Interchange, which help clients bring together content, process, data and intelligent analytics into a single, highly configurable user interface. Last year, the company announced the availability of Unity 7, an Enterprise-class Business Transformation Platform, designed to provide actionable analytics, case and content management and data integration from across the enterprise in a single, configurable, user interface. Unity 7 enables business users to take action directly on analytics screens, significantly improving productivity and usability of enterprise application deployments.
https://youtu.be/Bj7DQzYA8Mc
Intellective CEO Brian Schlosser stated, "The future is productive intelligence. The name, Intellective, better reflects what we have been doing with our clients in the utilization of cognitive computing and enterprise analytics to build transformative solutions for our customers. The word Intellective literally means 'The Power to Understand', which perfectly captures the nature of solutions we help our customers deploy today." Intellective provides the ability to rapidly deploy cognitive solutions which bring together content, data, workflow and intelligence for transformative businesses. "Our new name, together with our refreshed website and messaging highlights the state of our corporate growth and development," continued Schlosser.
About Intellective
Intellective is a global company with a mission to provide transformational business solutions. Intellective delivers solutions through our digital transformation platform Unity, a rapid application development environment that combines analytics, cognitive intelligence, content and process automation that help our customers modernize their business. Intellective is based in Irvine, California. www.intellective.com
Unity is a Trademark of Intellective Corporation.
